acceptanceCriteria:
- README has install section
- npm install command documented
codeDiff:
--- a/docs/api.md
+++ b/docs/api.md
@@ -10,6 +10,22 @@
 ## Endpoints
 
 ### GET /api/users
 
 Returns a list of users.
+
+**Query Parameters:**
+| Parameter | Type   | Default | Description          |
+|-----------|--------|---------|----------------------|
+| page      | number | 1       | Page number          |
+| limit     | number | 20      | Items per page       |
+| sort      | string | "name"  | Sort field           |
+
+**Response:**
+```json
+{
+  "data": [{ "id": "1", "name": "Alice" }],
+  "total": 42,
+  "page": 1,
+  "totalPages": 3
+}
+```

description: Adding input validation with Zod — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Email validated with Zod schema
- Name required, min 2 chars
- Error messages shown inline
- Tests for valid/invalid inputs

description: Adding rate limiting to API — should be approved
issueTitle: Add rate limiting to API endpoints
acceptanceCriteria:
- Max 100 requests per minute per IP
- 429 status returned when exceeded
- Test covers rate limit trigger
codeDiff:
--- a/src/middleware/rate-limit.ts
+++ b/src/middleware/rate-limit.ts
@@ -1,4 +1,20 @@
+import rateLimit from "express-rate-limit";
+
+export const apiLimiter = rateLimit({
+  windowMs: 15 * 60 * 1000, // 15 minutes
+  max: 100, // limit each IP to 100 requests per window
+  standardHeaders: true,
+  legacyHeaders: false,
+  message: { error: "Too many requests, please try again later" },
+});
+
+export const authLimiter = rateLimit({
+  windowMs: 60 * 60 * 1000, // 1 hour
+  max: 5, // limit login attempts
+  message: { error: "Too many login attempts" },
+});
